cn: 在一个由3名实习生组成的团队中，在技术项目经理的监督下，从零开始开发内部Web应用程序AltecaEvent，工作环境为法语环境。该应用程序可以创建和管理活动，回答相关问题卷，查看活动详情和管理用户角色。
任务分配：70%的时间用于使用Angular进行前端开发，30%用于使用FastAPI – Python进行后端开发。
使用Trello进行敏捷项目管理，跟踪任务，使用Postman测试API，使用Git管理代码，并使用Figma原型设计界面以优化用户体验。使用Visual Studio进行代码开发。
结果：我们完成了应用程序开发的95%，剩余部分需要与公司现有的内部系统进行集成。
参考人 - 实习导师：SAVARY Christophe < csavary@alteca.fr >
en: Developed the internal web application AltecaEvent from scratch, as part of a team of 3 interns, under the supervision of a technical project manager, in a French-speaking work environment. The application allows for creating and managing events, answering associated questionnaires, viewing event details, and managing user roles.
Task distribution: 70% of my time was spent on frontend development with Angular, and 30% on the backend with FastAPI – Python.

Agile project management with Trello, task tracking, API testing with Postman, code management with Git, and interface prototyping with Figma to optimize the user experience. Used Visual Studio for code development.
Result: We completed 95% of the application development, with the remaining part requiring integration with the company's internal system.
References - Internship supervisor: SAVARY Christophe < csavary@alteca.fr >

keyword.en: Web application, Angular, FastAPI – Python, Agile, APIs, Git, Trello, Postman, Visual Studio

cn: 使用Power BI进行销售数据分析：利用Power BI对销售数据进行详细深入的分析。设计交互式仪表板，为高层管理人员提供清晰的可视化和战略洞察，以支持明智的决策。
竞争性情报和市场研究：深入分析市场趋势和竞争对手类似产品的策略。为制定战略方向和规划新产品做出重要贡献，从而增强公司的竞争力和创新能力。
en: Sales data analysis with Power BI: Using Power BI to conduct a detailed and in-depth analysis of sales data. Designing interactive dashboards that provide senior management with clear visualizations and strategic insights for informed decision-making.

Competitive intelligence and market research: In-depth analysis of market trends and strategies of similar products offered by competitors. Contributing to the development of strategic directions and planning of new products, thus enhancing the company's competitiveness and innovation.
